title: Green Energy Capital Solutions
summary: Custom financing solutions for residential and commercial solar projects.
details: We provide tailored capital structures—equity, debt, and hybrid models—designed to optimise returns and reduce up-front costs. Our team performs deep technical and financial due diligence, models cashflows, and structures repayment schedules aligned with project timelines and offtake agreements.
author: Finance Team

title: Project Planning & Optimization
summary: End-to-end planning to maximise generation and ROI.
details: Our planning service covers site assessment, yield forecasting, design optimization, and construction phasing to increase energy production and lower levelized cost of energy (LCOE). We integrate financial sensitivity analysis so stakeholders can make data-driven decisions.
author: Engineering

title: Solar Hybrid Mortgage
summary: Hybrid financing that blends mortgage structures with renewable incentives.
details: Hybrid mortgage structures allow property owners to finance solar installations together with real estate loans, leveraging tax incentives and long-term PPA revenue streams. This product is ideal for mixed-use developments and large residential portfolios.
author: Product

title: Debt Financing Solutions
summary: Structured loans and credit facilities tailored for renewable projects.
details: We arrange senior debt, mezzanine finance and revolving credit facilities backed by project contracts. Our syndication network connects clients with regional and international lenders to secure competitive rates and flexible terms.
author: Capital Markets

title: Development & Construction Support
summary: Hands-on support from permitting to construction closeout.
details: Our team assists with permitting, EPC contracting, construction oversight, and commissioning. We implement cost-control measures and milestone-linked financing to keep projects on budget and on schedule.
author: Operations

title: Commercial PPAs
summary: Power Purchase Agreements for commercial & industrial customers.
details: We negotiate and structure PPAs that align offtaker needs with investor returns. Contract terms are optimized for price stability, performance guarantees, and credit support to de-risk offtake revenue streams.
author: Legal & Contracts

title: Tax Equity Financing
summary: Leveraging tax incentives to improve project returns.
details: We structure tax-equity partnerships that allow investors to monetise production & investment tax credits. Our specialists ensure compliance with tax rules while maximising after-tax cash flows for sponsors and investors.
author: Tax Desk

title: Real-time Visibility Dashboard
summary: Monitor project KPIs, cash flows and construction progress in real-time.
details: Our GenPulse™ dashboard provides investors and sponsors with live telemetry, milestone tracking, and automated alerts for deviations. It consolidates financial, technical and operational metrics into an intuitive interface.
author: Product

title: Inclusivity & Community Programs
summary: Programs to ensure community benefits and inclusive participation.
details: We design financing programs and community engagement plans that prioritise local hiring, shared ownership models, and affordable energy access. These initiatives help projects secure social licence and long-term sustainability.
author: ESG Team

title: Renewable Infrastructure Bonds
summary: Long-term bond investment for sustainable energy projects.
details: Our Renewable Infrastructure Bonds allow investors to participate in clean energy projects through fixed-income instruments. The bond structure ensures predictable returns while funding grid-scale solar and wind developments.
author: Finance Team

title: Smart Site Development
summary: Digital planning tools for next-gen renewable projects.
details: We use advanced geospatial mapping and AI-based design simulation to identify optimal land use and improve yield forecasts. Our technology accelerates permitting and reduces design errors by up to 30%.
author: Engineering

title: Solar Leasing Program
summary: Flexible lease models for commercial solar installations.
details: Our solar leasing product provides zero-down payment options with predictable monthly costs. This allows businesses to enjoy clean energy benefits without capital expenditure, backed by long-term O&M support.
author: Product

title: Energy Trading Contracts
summary: Customized power trading contracts for wholesale markets.
details: We help clients navigate deregulated energy markets through bilateral contracts, hedging mechanisms, and power swaps. Our legal team ensures transparency and compliance across multi-country jurisdictions.
author: Legal & Contracts

title: Performance Analytics Platform
summary: AI-powered insights for optimizing project ROI.
details: Our analytics platform uses machine learning to track energy production, cost efficiency, and predictive maintenance. It integrates seamlessly with IoT sensors and ERP systems for unified project management.
author: Data Science Team

title: Local Community Co-Ownership
summary: Empowering communities through shared ownership models.
details: We enable community members to invest directly in solar farms, earning dividends from clean energy generation. This inclusive model increases public support and creates long-term regional resilience.
author: ESG Desk

title: Green Debt Syndication
summary: Collaborative financing for large-scale solar projects.
details: We organize multi-lender syndication for renewable infrastructure, providing flexible repayment structures and credit enhancements. Our syndication desk ensures efficient fund allocation across partners.
author: Capital Markets

title: Construction Risk Management
summary: Minimizing construction delays and cost overruns.
details: We apply integrated risk management frameworks that track schedule, procurement, and safety performance in real-time. Our team provides early warning analytics to maintain budget and delivery timelines.
author: Operations

title: Blockchain Energy Contracts
summary: Smart contracts for transparent energy settlements.
details: We integrate blockchain-based contract execution to automate settlement, verification, and revenue distribution. This ensures transparency, eliminates intermediaries, and reduces transaction costs.
author: Legal & Innovation

title: Clean Energy Impact Fund
details: Our impact fund focuses on projects that generate measurable social and environmental benefits. It supports affordable solar access, education, and job creation in underserved areas.
author: Impact Finance
